ðŸ“– Summary: Blob Survival is a small, chaotic game written in C and raylib, drawing inspiration from Vampire Survivors. It utilizes a quad-tree for efficient collision detection, enabling it to handle thousands of enemies. The game is contained within a single `game.c` file and features pixelated graphics, an upgrade system, and various enemy types.
